class.name: CustomClassDB
class.brief_description: This class is a helper class for custom classes.
class.description: It is used to store the classes info to expose an API similar to the [ClassDB] API.

method.name: class_exists
method.description: Returns whether the specified class is available or not.

method.name: get_class_list
method.description: Returns the names of all the custom classes available.

method.name: instantiate
method.description: Creates an instance of the class. This method is similar to [method ClassDB.instantiate]. This method does not check if the class exists or not, so it is recommended to use [method class_exists] before calling this method.
